name: hadoop.fuse.connection.timeout
description:
The minimum number of seconds that we'll cache libhdfs connection objects
    in fuse_dfs. Lower values will result in lower memory consumption; higher
    values may speed up access by avoiding the overhead of creating new
    connection objects.

name: hadoop.registry.zk.retry.times
description: Zookeeper connection retry count before failing

name: mapreduce.input.lineinputformat.linespermap
description:
When using NLineInputFormat, the number of lines of input data
  to include in each split.

name: ipc.[port_number].decay-scheduler.metrics.top.user.count
description:
The number of top (i.e., heaviest) users to emit metric
    information about. This property applies to DecayRpcScheduler.

name: ha.health-monitor.sleep-after-disconnect.ms
description: How long to sleep after an unexpected RPC error.

name: dfs.ha.zkfc.port
description:
The port number that the zookeeper failover controller RPC
    server binds to.

name: ha.health-monitor.rpc.connect.max.retries
description:
The number of retries on connect error when establishing RPC proxy
    connection to NameNode, used for monitorHealth() calls.
